text: Nena, “Ine ndilibe mphamvu yopeza zinthu, kapena kupewa mavuto kupatula ndi chifuniro cha Mulungu. Ine ndikadakhala wodziwa chilichonse chobisika ndikadadzichulukitsira chuma ndipo palibe choipa chimene chikadandipeza. Ine sindine wina aliyense ayi koma wopereka chenjezo ndi wobweretsa nkhani yabwino kwa anthu okhulupirira.”
